name: Wordtopia
description:
Wordtopia is a word game utopia. An irreplaceable word game puzzle!

Wordtopia is a word game utopia. It is a word game based on classic word game with brand new maps and awesome game props.

Giving users unique game experience through its delicate game pictures and elaborately designed game levels. It is easy to play, levels can be passed after players found out all the available words.

Come on, try to use the given letters in a level and find out all the available words in prescribed moves.

Wordtopia is completely free to play but some optional in-game items will require payment with real money.

————Features of Wordtopia————

* Over 200 game levels in the original version.
* Delicate game pictures and elaborately designed game levels.
* Amazing utopia map.
* Everyday Lucky Wheel chance to achieve free game props.
* Login with Facebook ID to see your ranking and achievements.

————Game Modes————

【All】Find out all the words in prescribed moves.
【Boss】Collect the right words and kill the boss.
【Refurbish】New letters and layouts won’t show before the existed words have been found.
【Selected Letter】Find out a prescribed number of letters in limited moves.
【Pattern】Collect all the patterns in limited moves.

————Special Game Props————

【Sun】Melt the frozen letter, so the letter can be used in a word.
【Lightning】Remove the useless letters.
【Scissors】Cut the bundled letters so they can be used separately.
【Magnet】Bundle two letters to get more clues.
【Hint】Get hints when you have no ideas.
【Super Hint】Get one letter hint of half of the words in one level.
【Shuffle】Shuffle the letters or the layout to refresh.
【Addition】Add three moves.

———— How to Play ————

- Link the letters on the wheel to get a correct word.
- Find all the words and fill in the crossword blanks.
- All the words should be found before the steps used up.
